mapper.select: SELECT su.unit_name AS create_unit_name, sur.zh_name AS create_user_name, su2.unit_name AS receive_unit_name, sur2.zh_name AS receive_user_name, bc.cure_name AS base_cure_name, dos.* FROM data_orders dos LEFT JOIN sys_unit su ON su.id = dos.create_unit_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sur ON sur.id = dos.create_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_unit su2 ON su2.id = dos.receive_unit_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sur2 ON sur2.id = dos.receive_user_id LEFT JOIN base_cure bc ON bc.id = dos.base_cure_id WHERE 1=1 AND dos.id = #{ordersId}

SELECT su.unit_name AS create_unit_name, sur.zh_name AS create_user_name, su2.unit_name AS receive_unit_name, sur2.zh_name AS receive_user_name, bc.cure_name AS base_cure_name, dos.* FROM data_orders dos LEFT JOIN sys_unit su ON su.id = dos.create_unit_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sur ON sur.id = dos.create_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_unit su2 ON su2.id = dos.receive_unit_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sur2 ON sur2.id = dos.receive_user_id LEFT JOIN base_cure bc ON bc.id = dos.base_cure_id WHERE 1=1 AND dos.receive_unit_id IN
#{unitId}
AND dos.orders_num LIKE CONCAT ('%/',#{ordersNum},'%') ESCAPE '/'
AND dos.patient_name LIKE CONCAT ('%/',#{patientName},'%') ESCAPE '/'
AND su.unit_name LIKE CONCAT ('%/',#{createUnitName},'%') ESCAPE '/'
AND su2.unit_name LIKE CONCAT ('%/',#{receiveUnitName},'%') ESCAPE '/'
AND dos.status = #{status}
AND dos.status > 1
AND TO_DAYS(dos.create_time) = TO_DAYS(#{createTime})
ORDER BY dos.create_time desc

SELECT create_unit_id as unit_id, COUNT(create_unit_id) AS num FROM data_orders WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY create_unit_id ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT create_unit_id as unit_id, COUNT(create_unit_id) AS num FROM data_orders WHERE 1 = 1
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
GROUP BY create_unit_id ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT receive_unit_id as unit_id, COUNT(receive_unit_id) AS num FROM data_orders WHERE 1 = 1
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
GROUP BY receive_unit_id ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT create_unit_id as unit_id, COUNT(create_unit_id) AS num FROM data_orders WHERE 1 = 1
AND receive_unit_id = #{receiveUnitId}
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) >= TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(create_time) <= TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
GROUP BY receive_unit_id ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 0,10
